214  def run(self, request, courseid=None):
215 
216  user = request.session['user']
217 
218  if request.method == "GET":
219  if courseid:
220  if courseid in map(lambda x: x["id"], user["courses"]):
221  course = self.bus.getCourse(user, courseid)
222  return render(request, GENERAL_URL("frame.html"),
223  {'course':course})
224  else:
225  ld = lang.DICT
226  raise PermissionDenied(ld["EXCEPTION_403_STD"])
227  else:
228  raise PermissionDenied(lang.DICT["EXCEPTION_403_STD"])
229 
230  elif request.method == "POST":
231  lesson_form = LessonForm(request.POST)
232  try:
233  if lesson_form.is_valid():
234  lessonid = lesson_form.cleaned_data['lesson_id']
235  lessonid = lessonid.value
236 
237  slidenum = lesson_form.cleaned_data['slide_number']
238  slidenum = slidenum.value
239 
240  gc = self.bus.getCompleted
241 
242  if unicode(lessonid) not in gc(user, 'LOCK') and\
243  unicode(lessonid) not in gc(user, 'LESSON'):
244  ld = lang.DICT
245  raise PermissionDenied(ld["EXCEPTION_403_STD"])
246 
247 
248  lesson = self.bus.getLesson(lessonid)
249 
250  maxslides = lesson['slides']+len(lesson['exercises'])
251 
252  if slidenum >= maxslides or slidenum < 0:
253  raise PermissionDenied(lang.DICT["EXCEPTION_403_STD"])
254 
255  if slidenum < lesson['slides']:
256  lurl = lesson['url']
257  url = LESSONS_URL(lurl + "/" + str(slidenum) + ".html")
258 
259  return render(request, url, { 'max': maxslides })
260  else:
261  exercise_id = slidenum - lesson['slides']
262  exercise_url = lesson['exercises'][exercise_id]
263  url = EXERCISES_URL(exercise_url + ".html")
264 
265  exercise=self.bus.createExercise(request, exercise_url)
266 
267  return render(request, url, { 'max': maxslides,
268  'exercise': exercise })
269  else:
270  raise ValueError(lang.DICT['EXCEPTION_INV_LES'])
271  except ValueError as exc:
272  return render(request, GENERAL_URL("assync_std.html"),
273  {'error': exc})
